characters.name: Arrow
characters.description: One of the seaponies who appear in Aquastria in the picture book Under the Sparkling Sea. He is Coral's brother.

characters.name: Sir Aston
characters.description: Queen Novo's former royal advisor in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Bubble Splash
characters.description: A baby seapony that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Cerulean
characters.description: A seapony guard of Seaquestria in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Coral
characters.description: One of the seaponies who appear in Aquastria in the picture book Under the Sparkling Sea. She is Arrow's sister.

characters.name: Coral Rose
characters.description: The new Seaquestian historian in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Coralita
characters.description: Brenda Hickey's original concept version of Jewel. Unlike Jewel, she has a design more closely resembling the mythological hippocampus.

characters.name: Crystal Pearl
characters.description: A baby seapony. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Crystal Tide
characters.description: A member of the Seaquestrian royal army in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Electra
characters.description: One of the mermares who appear in Aquastria in the picture book Under the Sparkling Sea. She competes against Rainbow Dash in the Aquastria race.

characters.name: Golden Fin
characters.description: A seapony guard of Seaquestria in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Haven Bay
characters.description: A seapony/Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie. Has a toy figure, Enterplay trading card The Movie #27 (with Salina Blue: "Salina Blue and Haven Bay are just two of the many seapony subjects of Queen Novo and Princess Skystar. They love their new underwater home, though sometimes they still think about the air high above...") and collectible card game Seaquestria & Beyond expansion set card #77 U ("Haven Bay has spent countless hours combing the seabed, looking for interesting new seashells to bring back to Princess Skystar."), a My Busy Books figurine, etc.​[​specify​]​ Also appears on the front cover of Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Jelly Bee
characters.description: A baby seapony that appears in My Little Pony The Movie merchandise. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Jewel
characters.description: A mermare who's in love with Hoofbeard. Originally Coralita.

characters.name: Lilly Drop
characters.description: A baby seapony that appears in My Little Pony The Movie. Has a toy figure; "Lilly Drop™" on-package, "Lily Drop" online.

characters.name: Marina
characters.description: A(n) orca seapony/Orca-Pony/orca pony/orca merpony/orca/orca sea pony/orcapony original character. Appears on Friends Forever Issue #28 Phoenix Comics & Games cover RE.

characters.name: Queen Novo
characters.description: Queen Novo is a female seapony/Hippogriff who appears as a supporting character in My Little Pony The Movie and a minor character in the chapter books The Stormy Road to Canterlot and Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales. She also appears in the IDW comics and the episodes The Hearth's Warming Club and The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is the ruler of the kingdoms of Seaquestria and Hippogriffia and the mother of Princess Skystar.

characters.name: Ocean Flow
characters.description: Sky Beak and Ocean Flow are the respective Hippogriff and seapony parents of Silverstream and Terramar. Sky Beak first appears in School Daze - Part 2, and Ocean Flow first appears in Surf and or Turf.

characters.name: Ocean Gem
characters.description: A baby seapony. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Salina Blue
characters.description: A seapony/Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie. Named "Salina Sparkle" in the film's script and in The Official Movie Sourcebook. Has Enterplay trading card The Movie #27 (with Haven Bay: "Salina Blue and Haven Bay are just two of the many seapony subjects of Queen Novo and Princess Skystar. They love their new underwater home, though sometimes they still think about the air high above...") and collectible card game Seaquestria & Beyond expansion set card #83 R (with Fluttershy: "Two seaponies swimming circles around an intruder can quickly confuse and confound.") and #84 R ("Salina Blue is actually the seapony that suggested Princess Skystar start naming her seashell friends. And the rest is history..."), a My Busy Books figurine, etc.​[​specify​]​ Also appears on the front cover of Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Salt Air
characters.description: A seapony guard of Seaquestria in Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales.

characters.name: Sea Foam
characters.description: A baby seapony. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Sea Poppy
characters.description: A baby seapony/Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie and Gameloft's mobile game. Has a toy figure and Enterplay collectible card game Seaquestria & Beyond expansion set cards #38 R ("Sea Poppy’s luck is legendary among her friends. She once guessed how many grains of sand were in a bottle, and she was only off by three!") and #95 U (with Fluttershy: "Fluttershy was very happy to learn that there are Seaquestrians who care about the animals around them just as much as she does!").

characters.name: Princess Skystar
characters.description: Princess Skystar is a female seapony/Hippogriff who appears as a supporting character in My Little Pony The Movie and a central character in the chapter book Beyond Equestria: Fluttershy Balances the Scales. She also makes minor appearances in the chapter book The Stormy Road to Canterlot and the season nine episode The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is the princess of the underwater kingdom of Seaquestria and the daughter of Queen Novo.

characters.name: Sun Twist
characters.description: A baby seapony. Has a toy figure.

characters.name: Apple Bloom
characters.description: Apple Bloom is a female school-age Earth pony and a member of the Apple family. She is the younger sister of Applejack and Big McIntosh and granddaughter of Granny Smith. Apple Bloom is one of the founding members of the Cutie Mark Crusaders, a club/"secret" society devoted to helping ponies earn their cutie marks, along with Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo. She is varyingly called Apple Blossom and Apple Boom in some other media and promotional material.

characters.name: Applejack
characters.description: Applejack is a female Earth pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She lives and works at Sweet Apple Acres with her grandmother Granny Smith, her older brother Big McIntosh, her younger sister Apple Bloom, and her dog Winona. She represents the element of honesty.

characters.name: Fluttershy
characters.description: Fluttershy is a female Pegasus pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She lives in a small cottage near the Everfree Forest and takes care of animals, the most prominent of her charges being Angel the bunny. She represents the element of kindness.

characters.name: Ocellus
characters.description: Ocellus is a female changeling and one of the Young Six who first appears in season eight of the show as a student at Twilight Sparkle's School of Friendship.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: Pinkie Pie, full name Pinkamena Diane Pie, is a female Earth pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is an energetic and sociable baker at Sugarcube Corner, where she lives on the second floor with her toothless pet alligator Gummy, and she represents the element of laughter. Pinkie writes and performs many songs, and she is the source of many of the show's comical and cartoonish gags. She is called Ponka Po in some merchandise.

characters.name: Rainbow Dash
characters.description: Rainbow Dash is a female Pegasus pony and one of the main characters in My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She maintains the weather and clears the skies in Ponyville. As a huge fan of the Wonderbolts, she becomes a reservist member of the elite flying group in Testing Testing 1, 2, 3 and a full member in Newbie Dash. In Sonic Rainboom, Rarity and Princess Celestia both declare that she is the best flier in all of Equestria. Rainbow Dash has a pet tortoise named Tank, whom she chooses out of Fluttershy's offered animals in the episode May the Best Pet Win! She represents the element of loyalty.

characters.name: Rarity
characters.description: Rarity is a female unicorn pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is Sweetie Belle's older sister and the subject of Spike's long-term crush. Rarity works as both a fashion designer and as a seamstress at her own shop in Ponyville, the Carousel Boutique. She has a white Persian cat named Opalescence. She represents the element of generosity.

characters.name: Scootaloo
characters.description: Scootaloo is a female school-age Pegasus pony. She first appears in Friendship is Magic, part 1, and she is later properly introduced in Call of the Cutie. Scootaloo and her friends, Apple Bloom and Sweetie Belle form the Cutie Mark Crusaders, a club/"secret society" devoted to helping ponies earn their cutie marks. She is a talented scooter driver. She idolizes Rainbow Dash and develops a sisterly bond with her in Sleepless in Ponyville. Lauren Faust has stated that Scootaloo and Rainbow are not related.[6]

characters.name: Silverstream
characters.description:
This is a list of non-pony characters in My Little Pony Friendship is Magic and associated media, including zebras, donkeys, dragons, and griffons. Official names are in bold. These names are mentioned in the show, in the comics, Hasbro's toy line, or stated by the show's crew. Names that are not in bold are placeholder names which are unofficial and are decided according to the placeholder names policy. Names in gray are up for vote. Colors and times are approximate.

  • How to add a character

characters.name: Sweetie Belle
characters.description: Sweetie Belle is a school-age unicorn pony and Rarity's younger sister. She makes her first major appearance in the episode Call of the Cutie. Sweetie Belle and her friends, Apple Bloom and Scootaloo, form the Cutie Mark Crusaders, a club/"secret society" devoted to helping ponies earn their cutie marks.

characters.name: Terramar
characters.description: Terramar is a male Hippogriff/seapony and Silverstream's younger[1] brother who first appears as a supporting character in the season eight episode Surf and/or Turf.

characters.name: Twilight Sparkle
characters.description: Twilight Sparkle is the central main character of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is a female unicorn pony who transforms into an Alicorn and becomes a princess in Magical Mystery Cure. She is also the daughter of Twilight Velvet and Night Light, the younger sister of Shining Armor, sister-in-law to Princess Cadance, and paternal aunt to Flurry Heart.

  • How to add a character

characters.name:
Seapony Guard
​[​specify​]​
characters.description: A seapony/Hippogriff that appears in My Little Pony The Movie and Gameloft's mobile game. Has Enterplay collectible card game Seaquestria & Beyond expansion set card #26 C ("Luckily for the seaponies, their years of spear training as hippogriffs transferred over well to using them underwater to protect the realm of Seaquestria."). The game's description of Graceful Hippogriff states, "This hippogriff's blue mane was great camouflage when she lived under the sea -- luckily for her, it works just as well in a clear, sunlit sky!" Her design was reused for a second seapony guard and the mobile game character "Stalwart Hippogriff Guard".
